game.name: Cannon Hero Online
game.description:
Evil souls are everywhere and you as a boy have taken a responsibility to clear all of them and make this world worth living for all. No need to be scared of such terrible monsters who give you only one chance to attack on them. They are skilled enough to operate their weapons, so they can kill you even a single shot. Do you think that you also have the skill-set to fight against them? Join Cannon Hero Online and be prepared to eliminate these heartless souls! 
The best part is that you also own a powerful mighty cannon in this brand new action packed challenge. Avoid delaying anymore and come forward to react fast and send all of them to the hell for their bad work! Take your time and aim your target wisely to score and earn some exciting rewards! Your enemies have already taken their positions at the tall towers. So, they will shoot your cannon hero in a single shot. Eliminate these bad guys before they clear you from the screen in this free online shooting game!
Be careful while aiming your enemies as you will be given only one shot to shoot each monster! If you miss your shot, they will release the rocket and you will be out of the game immediately. Grab points to purchase different character modes and also apply improved upgrades like shields! There are different 10 character models to use, and this interesting arcade game features simple cartoonish graphics, and physics-based gameplay.
